title: Child, 12, accidentally shot by 11-year-old while playing with gun
content:
JONESBORO, GA (CBS46) -
Clayton County police are investigating an accidental shooting that involved a 12-year-old and an 11-year-old.
The incident occurred around 3:30 p.m. Saturday afternoon on Fitzgerald Road in Jonesboro.
According to authorities in Clayton County, the two boys were playing with a gun when the 12-year-old was accidentally shot.
The victim was air-flighted to an Atlanta area hospital. He went into surgery Saturday evening and is still considered to be in critical condition.
Stay tuned to CBS46 and CBS46.com for the latest details.
